Similar to the answer before, the fault lies with the device itself and the individual that allowed them to be present in a room full of children. The question is why these scissors are in the classroom.
hurt: The proximate cause of Andy getting hurt was the transference of ownership from Suzy to Andy. The root cause, however, is the presence of scissors on an unsafe design being in a classroom of children. Tommy forgot to place to safety caps back in to the scissors but most tools that present a sharp object hazard have a guard that is attached to the object and must be tampered with to remove the safety device.
Suzy because she handed Andy the scissors with the pointy end toward him, even though there were no caps on the scissors.
